RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 1 870 Y Dirt CR: 58. Claiming Purse 3500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOOKEDONSEVENNSEVEN two path, drew off. ONE SWEET GAME gaining at finish. MR SECRET LEE widest, mild gain. ARJET wide trip, no menace. IM A FANCY BLUE hugged rail, faded.

ENTRY.NAME: One Sweet Game
ENTRY.OWNER: Jourdan Preston and Jourdan Jr Preston

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 2 220 Y Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 8400. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPEEDEAUX PRIZE motored on by. SOUTH HENRY STREAK off best, caught. JUST PLAIN DEADLY good bid, outkicked. BOSSY BUX lacked needed kick.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 3 350 Y Dirt CR: 63. Maiden Claiming Purse 4500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAKIN IT BIG fired, just held. EL CLEMENTITO strong late strides. CCR COOK WAGON always close. MR COMMANDER drifted out late. JTC SWITCHING LEADS mild threat. MR RAGLEY KID changed lane midway. JESS A WILD SHANNON off step slow. PER RULING #25253 DATED 3/2/23 RECEIVED FROM THE LOUISIANA RACING COMMISSION, EL CLEMENTITO WAS DISQUALIFIED DUE TO A POSITIVE TEST.

ENTRY.NAME: Jess a Wild Shannon
ENTRY.OWNER: Peterson Brian and Clay Johnnie Mae

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 4 400 Y Dirt CR: 87. Allowance Purse 11000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHES TRUE BLUE broke in,won the bob. JULIES LIL ROGUE broke out, photoed out. JJS LACE no trouble, outdueled. JESSABLUESMAN sandwiched start. MAJESTICS BEST GAME early bump, fought on. MR HEMP PERRY broke inward sharply.

ENTRY.NAME: Majestics Best Game
ENTRY.OWNER: Williams Ralph A and Vincent Jr Floyd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 5 110 Y Dirt CR: 86. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 6700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $10,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIXIN TOO fired first step. RUNAWAY YALL late surge. PATORANADO outdueled. FIRST GREEN DIAMOND closer than appears. JJ CORONAS SNOW got loose loading. PAINTURSHADOW squeezed out midway.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 6 350 Y Dirt CR: 76. Allowance Purse 7000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CB PINKMOONIN stronger every step. ONE SWEET QUEEN BEE nipped at wire. BP CORONAS never far from it. TF HOMEMADE SOAP brushed, outdueled.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 7 250 Y Dirt CR: 62. Maiden Claiming Purse 4500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIVE BAR CREEK trouble free, fired. TIPPY THE TRAIN propelled midway. SWEET CAJUN CORONA in mix, no kick. SUGAR TIME GIRL bid, weakened. I GOT FIRERY obliterated start. BLUE TRAIN slow into stride. VP FIRST DOWN CORONA broke out, bumped foe. TF ONE SPECIAL JESS pinched back at break. APOLLITCALOBSESSION stumbled start.
